amendment.description: Amendment strikes provisions folding the Coastal Zone Management Program into State nonpoint source management programs and, instead, reauthorizes the Coastal Zone Act through fiscal year 2000, amending it to require that any State that has not received Federal approval for its core coastal management program must submit a coastal non-point pollution program within 30 months of such approval.
amendment.purpose: An amendment (printed as amendment No. 4 in the Congressional Record of May 9) to delete the provision in the bill that incorporate the Coastal Zone Management Program into state nonpoint source management programs. The amendment would reauthorize the Coastal Zone Management program through FY 2000, with certain modifications.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boehlert amendment (A006) Agreed to by recorded vote: 224 - 199 (Roll no. 314).
